document.full_text: two climbers have been killed in an avalanche on mount frances in alaska's denali national park, making them the first to perish on that craggy peak near mount mckinley, the national park service said on wednesday.
document.title: two climbers killed in avalanche on alaska mountain
lines_and_colors: two climbers have been killed in an avalanche on mount frances in alaska's denali national park, making them the first to perish on that craggy peak near mount mckinley, the national park service said on wednesday.
